settings.content: For best results, upload images that are around 1280px in width and under 600px in height. Try to keep your slideshow images the same size.

settings.label: Stretch Slideshow to Full Screen Width
Shipping Rates Calculator default country selection

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the spelling to use above, refer to your first checkout page.

settings.label: [DISQUS](http://disqus.com/) Comments Enabled (instead of Shopify's default comments)

settings.content: To enable this feature, you must first edit your money formats as per [these instructions](http://wiki.shopify.com/Do_Tell_Where_The_Money_Is) (“Do tell where the money is”).
Although you will be able to display prices on your store front in different currencies, Shopify will still process orders in your shop's currency.
Separate your currency codes with a space. Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code. [Complete list of currency codes](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Example: CAD USD.
To test this feature, set the number of days until the popup is displayed again to 0.

settings.label: Days until Popup is Displayed Again
